feature.label: FreeBoogie
feature.description: This version is for developers & researchers on program verifiers. It is not yet ready for prime-time. FreeBoogie is developed in Java 1.6 so it should work on many platforms. The tests and some other development helpers, however, are Linux (or UNIX?) specific. The rest assumes that you are on Linux. Try this: source setenv ant test fbrun freeboogie.Main --help fbrun freeboogie.Main -pfg boogie_Bag2.bpl Enjoy. Note: Now working on VC generation.
